scripts.build: npm run size-js && npm run minify-css
scripts.minify-js: npm run build-js && uglifyjs -c warnings=false -m < static/bundle.js > static/bundle.min.js
scripts.size-js: npm run minify-js && gzip < static/bundle.min.js | wc -c | pretty-bytes
scripts.watch-js: watchify client -o static/bundle.js -dv & DEBUG=* nodemon server.js
